Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.selenium.functions.searching

Class ScrollWebElementIntoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.selenium.functions.searching.ScrollWebElementIntoView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openqa.selenium.WrapsElement, ScrollsIntoView
    @Beta
public abstract class ScrollWebElementIntoView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScrollsIntoView, org.openqa.selenium.WrapsElement
    This class is used for the supporting of actions to be performed on some web element when it is found with some SearchSupplier.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ScrollWebElementIntoView​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elementToBeScrolledIntoView)

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getWrappedElement()  
      protected abstract boolean needsForTheScrolling​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Defines the necessity to perform the scrolling of the element into view.
      abstract void scrollIntoView()
      This method should scroll the web element into view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScrollWebElementIntoView

        public ScrollWebElementIntoView​(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elementToBeScrolledIntoView)

    • Method Detail

      • needsForTheScrolling

        protected abstract boolean needsForTheScrolling​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Defines the necessity to perform the scrolling of the element into view.
        Parameters:
        method - is a method to perform the scrolling before
        Returns:
        true when it is necessary to perform the scrolling of an element. false is returned otherwise.

      • scrollIntoView

        public abstract void scrollIntoView()
        This method should scroll the web element into view.

        NOTE!

        When a WebElement is received with some SearchSupplier then this method is invoked implicitly every time before any method passed via needsForTheScrolling(Method) with the result true.
        Specified by:
        scrollIntoView in interface ScrollsIntoView

      • getWrappedElement

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getWrappedElement()
        Specified by:
        getWrappedElement in interface org.openqa.selenium.WrapsElement
